representation_information.name: Direct Stream Digital Interchange File Format, DSDIFF, Version 1.5
representation_information.description: Format Description for DSDIFF - Format for the storage or exchange of one-bit delta sigma modulated audio, often called Direct Stream Digital, or for the losslessly compressed version called Direct Stream Transfer (DST).

extras.field: dff, dft, df0, df1, df2, df3, df4, df5, df6, df7, df8, df9

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
